4th gen Intel® Core™ i7 processor

ASUS ROG G Series - Experience Power from Within

New with ASUS TurboMaster GPU Overclocking Technology and up to NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 980M Dedicated Graphics

Exclusively on the G751

The all-new G751 features a whole new gamer-centric interface, with a brand new Gaming Center for all the information you need and dedicated quick-access macro keys.

Gaming Center: Launch Gaming Center at a press of the ROG key

The ROG key gives you quick access to the Gaming Center dashboard where you can access system settings and launch games.

Gaming Center: System information

System information can easily be accessed through the Gaming Center dashboard, allowing users to understand storage and drive space availability, as well as the amount of memory used.

Gaming Center: Gamer Profile Settings

Gamers can set up to four different gaming modes with their preferred settings (such as turning on GPU Tweak), each tailored to different situations and needs.

Quick-Access Keys

The G751 features quick-access game keys and additional programmable macro keys for easy access to Steam, game recording and your frequently used commands.

  • ROG Key
  • System Info
  • Profile
  • Macro Keyes

Game Faster

With upgraded gaming and TurboMaster Technology, the G Series helps you dominate opponents with superior performance and longevity.

ASUS TurboMaster GPU Technology

GPU Tweak supports 5% overclocking while an upgraded cooling system ensures your G Series stays cool and quiet.

Up to NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 980M dedicated graphics

Incredible Gaming Desktop Performance Made Portable

Delivering a staggering 50% faster performance than the GTX 880M, the new GeForce GTX 980M brings high-end desktop gaming performance to the notebook.

Marathon Gaming with GeForce Battery Boost

Battery Boost delivers an incredible 30+ FPS experience with up to 3x the battery life.

Newest GeForce GTX Gaming Features

Share your favorite gaming moments with GeForce ShadowPlay™ and expand the battlefield from your PC to any GameStream-ready TV or tablet.

Fast, Fluid, Lifelike Experience

Supporting DirectX 12 and thanks to the new Cone-Traced Global Illumination technology, new for GeForce GTX 980M is more realistic, cinema-quality lightning and lifelike gaming experience.

Designed for Gamers

Black. Red. Stealth. Know an ROG when you see one.

Stealth Fighter Design

With sleek, sharp lines inspired by a stealth fighter jet and a mysterious black finish, the G Series notebooks pack an enormous amount of power but feel no need to brag about it. You won’t see them coming.

Ultra-Responsive One-Piece Backlit Keyboard

With long travel keys for instant response, the seamless one-piece backlit keyboard is a joy to use anytime, anywhere even after extended sessions.

Play it cool

Get to the finish line without having to power down. The G Series uses intelligent cooling designs with large vents that guarantee stability and low temperatures even when overclocking.

Duo-Copper Thermal Solution (G750/G751 only)

Uniquely featured on the G750 & G751, three heat pipes direct heat to dual independent fans and copper heatsinks to provide maximum cooling efficiency.

Duo Rear-Venting Fan (G750/G751 only)

Heat is quietly expelled through the back of the notebook - away from the gamer - so you can focus on your games.

Quickly removes heat from core components to ensure the utmost stability and reliability.

Gaming rig

The G Series packs a punch, providing extra power to headphones and supporting future-ready 4k2k connectivity. Play how you want and hear what you want.

Future-ready: 4k2k HDMI output

The HDMI 1.4 port lets you connect to hi-res screens that go far beyond today’s 1080p systems. Plug in and experience immersive, true-to-life gaming.

Trinity Display Technology

Output gaming to three displays simultaneously via HDMI 1.4 or Mini DisplayPort 1.2. Game, watch a movie, or browse the web – all at once.

Kill Or Be Killed: Killer WLAN Support*

Exclusive wireless technology delivers fast data-transfer speeds of up to 300Mbits/s.

Powerful Headphone Amp for Improved Clarity (G750 only)

Enjoy reduced audio distortion and a wider frequency range for a more accurate, detailed stereo sound.

ROG AudioWizard

Modify sound settings to your preference or choose between 5 preset modes – War Room, Soundscape, Battlefield, Action, Multimedia – for the ultimate winning soundtrack.

Unbeatable Bass

Whether via an external subwoofer included with the G550 or the internal subwoofer on the G751, G Series gaming notebooks are designed to deliver an impressive low-end bass that you can feel.

  • 4k Gaming
  • Trinity Display Technology
  • Killer Wireless-N
  • Headphone Amp
  • ROG AudioWizard
  • Unbeatable Bass

The Choice of Champions

The realms of overclocking and performance is dominated by the Republic of Gamers. Infused with the ROG DNA, own your opponents with the ultimate gaming notebook.
